## test3

```{r setup, include = TRUE, cache = FALSE}
library(RefManageR)
file <- system.file("Bib", "biblatexExamples.bib", package = "RefManageR")
BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE, style = "markdown", bib.style = "authoryear", cite.style = 'alphabetic')
bib = ReadBib(file, check="error")
```

Does the DOI appear okay as a link?

```{r, results='asis'}
bib[author="Kastenholz"]
```

I think the markdown needs to be [10.1063/1.2172593](http://dx.doi.org/10.1063/1.2172593)
